name: onlooker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who watches something that is happening in a public place but is not involved in it: A crowd of curious onlookers soon gathered to see what was happening. Synonym
looker-on
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
an audienceaudienceThe audience went wild after every song she sang.viewerThe show attracts millions of viewers every week.listenerListeners tune in regularly for his cheery banter.crowdThose New Yorkers can be a tough crowd to please.houseIt's a full house tonight.spectatorThe spectators cheered when the balloon went up.

Add to word list
someone who watches something happening but is not involved in it: The building was demolished before a crowd of nearly 200 onlookers.
